title: is it normal for gifts from skins to dissapear?
body: a long time ago my friend bretski ( changed his username ) gifted me popstar ahri and some other dude who doesnt play league anymore gifted me program liss..is it normal for them to dissapear?

replies.body:
If you hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can take a look at your account and break down what went down.

If you have any questions, let me know.
Usually when gifts get removed it is due to the accounts that sent them having issues with chargebacks.
